glsa.title: libpcre: Heap integer overflow
glsa.synopsis: libpcre is vulnerable to a heap integer overflow, possibly leading to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: libpcre is a library providing functions for Perl-compatible regular expressions.

description.p: libpcre fails to check certain quantifier values in regular expressions for sane values.

impact.p: An attacker could possibly exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code by sending specially crafted regular expressions to applications making use of the libpcre library.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libpcre users should upgrade to the latest version:
